gobblin.compliance.purger

Class HivePurgerSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.compliance.purger.HivePurgerSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source

    public class HivePurgerSource
extends Object
implements Source
    This class creates WorkUnits and assigns exactly one partition to each of them. It iterates over all Hive Tables specified via whitelist and blacklist, list all partitions, and create workunits. It revive WorkUnits if their execution attempts are not exhausted.

      • createWorkUnits

        protected void createWorkUnits(SourceState state)
                        throws IOException
        This method creates the list of all work units needed for the current execution. Fresh work units are created for each partition starting from watermark and failed work units from the previous run will be added to the list.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • workUnitsExceeded

        protected boolean workUnitsExceeded()

                         throws IOException

        protected List<HivePartitionDataset> sortHiveDatasets(List<HivePartitionDataset> datasets)
        Sort all HiveDatasets on the basis of complete name ie dbName.tableName

      • createWorkunitsFromPreviousState

        protected void createWorkunitsFromPreviousState(SourceState state)
        Add failed work units in a workUnitMap with partition name as Key. New work units are created using required configuration from the old work unit.

      • setTimeStamp

        protected void setTimeStamp()

        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface Source

      • setLowWatermark

        protected void setLowWatermark(SourceState state)
        Sets the local watermark, which is a class variable. Local watermark is a complete partition name which act as the starting point for the creation of fresh work units.

      • setExecutionCount

        protected void setExecutionCount(SourceState state)

      • submitCycleCompletionEvent

        protected void submitCycleCompletionEvent()
        If low watermark is at the reset point, then either cycle is completed or starting for the first time If executionCount is greater than 1, then cycle is completed If cycle is completed, executionCount will be reset and cycle completion event will be submitted

      • getLowWatermark

        protected String getLowWatermark()

      • setJobWatermark

        protected void setJobWatermark(SourceState state,
                               String watermark)
        Sets Job Watermark in the SourceState which will be copied to all WorkUnitStates. Job Watermark is a complete partition name. During next run of this job, fresh work units will be created starting from this partition.

      • getWatermarkFromPreviousWorkUnits

        protected static String getWatermarkFromPreviousWorkUnits(SourceState state,
                                                          String watermark)
        Fetches the value of a watermark given its key from the previous run.
